statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE file_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp > '2021-10-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity_logs WHERE action = 'download';
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE file_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity_logs WHERE action LIKE '%download%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, file_id, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 5 AND action = 'login' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLogs;
SELECT user_id, action FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM FileSharingServiceUsers WHERE registration_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM UserActivityLogs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM FileSharingServiceUsers ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT user_id, action FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM UserActivityLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM FileSharingServiceUsers WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLogs JOIN FileSharingServiceUsers ON UserActivityLogs.user_id = FileSharingServiceUsers.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM files WHERE upload_date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, file_name FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, username FROM files JOIN users ON files.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE created_at < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_type LIKE 'Logout%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT users.username, files.file_name FROM users JOIN files ON users.user_id = files.file_id WHERE users.created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY files.created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_id FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE ur.role_id = 1;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(u.user_id) AS total_activities FROM users u JOIN user_activity_logs l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_activities > 100 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE signup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size FROM files ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT action_name, description FROM actions WHERE action_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, action_id, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE signup_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000
SELECT action_id, action_name, description FROM actions ORDER BY action_name DESC
SELECT user_id, action_id, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
